name: Fun School!
description:
Fun School! is an educational game part of the Fun School series. This version is aimed at the under eight years. Parents can choose a difficulty level for each game and also enter their own words to use. There are ten activities for a child to play and these consist of:
  • Balance
  • Castle
  • Derrick
  • Freds Words
  • Hilo
  • Maths Test
  • Mouser
  • Number Signs
  • Seawall
  • Super Spell
